Test Name: Germinal Center B-cell Expressed Transcript 1 (GCET1) Immunostain
Purpose: To detect germinal center B-cell markers in lymphoid tissue via GCET1 immunostaining.
Container: Positively charged glass slide (FFPE tissue section)
Equipment: Microtome, hot plate/oven, pressure cooker or microwave for antigen retrieval, humidity chamber, incubator, HRP polymer detection system, microscope
